# GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/buildBundleFileSizes | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/buildBundleFileSizes ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-buildbundlefilesizes)

-  GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/buildBundleFileSizes 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/buildBundleFileSizes

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-buildbundlefilesizes#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/buildBundleFileSizes
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-buildbundlefilesizes#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-buildbundlefilesizes#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-buildbundlefilesizes#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[BuildBundleBuildBundleFileSizesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/buildbundlebuildbundlefilesizeslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-buildbundlefilesizes#see-also)

### [Getting Build Bundle Information](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-buildbundlefilesizes#Getting-Build-Bundle-Information)

[`Read the App Clip Domain Cache Status Information for a Build Bundle`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-appclipdomaincachestatus)Get the cache status of the domain you associate with your App Clip for a specific build bundle.[`Read App Clip Domain Debug Status Information for a Build Bundle`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-appclipdomaindebugstatus)Get the debug status of the domain you associate with your App Clip for a specific build bundle.[`List All Beta App Clip Invocations for a Build Bundle`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-betaappclipinvocations)Get all App Clip invocations you configure for testing for a specific build bundle.[`List All File Sizes for a Build Bundle`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-buildbundlefilesizes)Get all file sizes for a specific build bundle.[`GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/appClipDomainCacheStatus`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-appclipdomaincachestatus)[`GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/appClipDomainDebugStatus`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-appclipdomaindebugstatus)[`GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/betaAppClipInvocations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-buildbundles-_id_-relationships-betaappclipinvocations)
